thought: The Gmail send action failed because the params were not set. I need to set the required parameters correctly, including sendTo, subject, emailType, and message, using expressions to extract from input data.
plan: Set sendTo to the fixed email 'qwuqwuqwu@gmail.com'
Set subject to '={{$json["subject"]}}' to get subject from input data
Set message to '={{$json["message"]}}' to get message body from input data
Test sending emails again to verify success
criticism: Without setting the required params for the Gmail send action, the workflow cannot send emails. This is a critical missing step that must be fixed immediately.

tool_input.comments: Set Gmail send action parameters to send email to fixed recipient with subject and message from input data.
